seniority_level.evidence: Master's degree required, complex responsibilities including predictive models, enterprise applications, and data governance leadership suggest senior level despite consultant title

job_family.evidence: Core responsibilities focus on data gathering, storage, batch/real-time processing, database integration, and data cleansing - classic data engineering functions

sub_specialty.evidence: Heavy emphasis on data governance, data lineage, metadata analysis, data quality, compliance, and specific tools (Alation, Manta) designed for data governance

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of managing people, direct reports, or team leadership - focuses on technical execution and collaboration as individual contributor

primary_cloud.evidence: No cloud providers (AWS, Azure, GCP) mentioned in job posting or Pass 1 extraction

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned at all

processing_paradigm.evidence: Job posting explicitly mentions 'both batch and real-time processing' requirements

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools (Airflow, Spark, dbt, etc.) mentioned in job posting

storage_layer.evidence: No specific storage systems (warehouse, lake, lakehouse) mentioned in job posting

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as 'Pune, Maharashtra, India' with onsite work model requirement

timezone_focus.evidence: India-based role with specific location requirement in Pune

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite requirement in Pune, Maharashtra, India suggests relocation would be needed for non-residents

h1b_friendly.evidence: India-based role, H1B visa not applicable; Pass 1 extraction shows visa sponsorship not mentioned

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: India-based role, US student visas (OPT/CPT) not applicable

citizenship_required.evidence: India-based role would require work authorization in India, but no specific citizenship requirements mentioned

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Pass 1 extraction shows employment type and contract type as 'not_mentioned'

benefits_level.evidence: Pass 1 extraction shows no benefits mentioned in job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career growth, advancement opportunities, or development paths mentioned in job posting

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship programs or working with senior staff mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion or advancement opportunities mentioned in job posting

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities mentioned

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between 'Required Technical And Professional Expertise' and 'Preferred Technical And Professional Experience' suggests medium strictness

scope_definition.evidence: Focused role on data governance consulting within data engineering, not multi-role hybrid position

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skills mentioned (data governance, Alation, Manta, predictive models) are reasonable and specialized for senior data engineering role focused on governance
